artist: Artist: Colin Upton; Publisher: Colin Upton , Vancouver
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photocopied image with accompanying text printed on wove paper cover; 24 pp.

title: Colin's Comics, vol. 2: The Little Things, 1992-2002
